comments:
I got a fresh new installation of Eclipse 3.3.1 on Windows XP. I downloaded the Eclipse SDK and then from the update site I downloaded all of the Europa projects.
I created a C project with trivial content: just one file with only a main method with several simple lines of code. The project builds and runs successfully. 
However, when I try to debug a get a message that the launching has failed.
I used default configuration for everything (I haven't configured anything).
I have MinGW 5.1.3 as a toolchain.

Thanks, Darko.

-- Error Log --

Did you install gdb?

You know, Wascana (http://wascana.sourceforge.net) has MinGW all preconfigured for you.
